Agenda Widget Save> Help Backup Settings Restore Settings Add new Refresh Widget settings General Calendar Tasks Every Next OK Number of lines No limit location notes priority all day Appearance Background Color The widget\'s background color. Drop Shadow Drop a shadow around the widget. It disables widget\'s transparency. Header Color The color of the header\'s date. Controls Color The color of the widget\'s control buttons. Title and Date Color The color of the events\' title and date (1st line). Location and Notes Color The color of the events\' location and notes (2nd and 3rd lines). Today\'s Events Bold Use bold font for today\'s events title and date (1st line). Today\'s Title and Date Color The color of the today\'s events title and date (1st line). Today\'s Location and Notes Color The color of the today\'s events location and notes (2nd and 3rd lines). Date and Time Format Long Date Short Date Time Calendars Select Calendars Selects the calendars that appear in the widget. Calendar Options Search Period Group by Date Groups events by date, showing a common date header. Repeat Multiple Day Events If selected multiple day events are repeatedly shown in each day. Otherwise they are shown only in their first day. Layout Options Indicate All Day Events When selected, the \"(all day)\" literal will be added next to an event, to explicitly indicate that it is an all day event. Show Event\'s Location Show event\'s location on a separate line. Show Event\'s Notes Show event\'s notes on a separate line. Event\'s Notes Number of Lines Maximum number of lines to use for showing the event\'s notes. Tasks Task Provider Select the tasks provider. Select Tasks Selects the tasks that appear in the widget. Task Options Show Overdue Tasks When selected, it will treat overdue tasks as today\'s. Show Future Tasks Shows tasks that have not started yet. Use Calendar\'s Search Period When selected, it will not display tasks with both start and due dates after the search period. Use Calendar\'s Layout Options Use same layout options with calendar events when applicable. Full Long Medium Short Custom Custom format string Year Format: yy: 2 digit number, yyyy: 4 digit number
Month Format: M: number, MM: number with leading zero, MMM: abbreviated name (e.g. Oct), MMMM: full name (e.g. October)
Day Format: d: Day in month, dd: Day in month with leading zero
Weekday Format: E: abbreviated name (e.g. Sun), EEEE: full name (e.g. Sunday)
Hour Format: H: 24 hour, HH: 24 hour with leading zero, h: 12 hour, hh: 12 hour with leading zero
Minute Format: mm: Minutes
